banner-description1: We offer bespoke solutions according to your needs
info-text1: MRF is continuing to undergo an important diversification into different and diverse markets, and we are actively searching forpartners expert in the design of steel products and with the capacity and proximity to co-design reliable solutions.
info-title1: We offer solutions for sectors such as:
info-text3: At MRF we can manufacture any solution that requires a very close level of co-operation and reliability, thanks to the fact that we have machinery for laser cutting, bending, stamping, welding and surface finishing (polishing and shot blasting) for AISI 304 steel:

item1.title: Laser cut
item1.description:
Sheets up to 3,000 x 1,500 mm
Maximum thickness in stainless steel: 15 mm
Maximum thickness in carbon steel: 25 mm

item2.title: Machining
item2.description:
Machining centers
CNC lathes
Polished gloss

item3.title: Folding
item3.description: 220 Tm folder and up to 4,280 mm

info-description4: Starting from a design idea adapted to the needs of the client, at MRF we accompany you from the design phase, through to prototypes and tooling to serial manufacturing.

info-menu4.item2: Flexibility and adapting to different needs

blue-banner-text: Do you have a specific project or need?
